item.title: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS
item.description: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS Jammy Jellyfish is the latest version released in Aptril 2022. You can get it today, and run it on various environments such as Desktop, Servers, IoT, Cloud and much more.

item.title: Download Ubuntu
item.description: Version and system requirements Ubuntu 22.04 LTS Ubuntu 22.04 LTS, the latest LTS(Long term support) version provides 5 years of maintenance and security updates for free. In most cases, LTS version is recommended for stable use. See Ubuntu 22.04 LTS release notes (Indonesian translation) See Ubuntu 22.04 LTS release notes Ubuntu 21.10 If you want to try out latest features, Try out Ubuntu 21.10, the latest version. It provides 9 months of maintenance and security updates for free.
